attributes.comment:
I would please ask that the fees for the I600A/I171H and fingerprints not be
increased. Costs for adoption are so expensive and these added increases with
the increase in wait times would cause undue hardship on families that so
desperately want to create a family through adoption. Unfortunately the forms
expire in 15/18 months and due to the ever increasing wait times it causes
families to have to redo these forms and pay again. My family has already paid
these fees twice and may have to pay them a third time. Maybe if you have to
increase the fees then you could make it so the form doesn't expire and have to be
redone with added fees. One other suggestion would be that the government would
allow us to deduct all of our adoption expenses instead of being limited to the
almost $11,000 as most adoptions cost between $16,000-$30,000.
I would hope that you would not increase the fees but if you do please consider
the options given above. We all want the same things- helping to bring families
together through adoption.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Angela
